typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as short,
		EAddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSSOURCE
source(output(
		ID as string,
		EName as string,
		Salary as string,
		Address as string,
		Insert_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DesRef
DesRef select(mapColumn(
		ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RefSelect
ADLSSOURCE, RefSelect lookup(EID == ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
